verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thee have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

Of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> to thee by <S%H7651>sevens,<s%> <S%H7651><s%> the <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female:<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> by <S%H8147>two,<s%> the <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female.<s%>

Of <S%H4480>fowls<s%> <S%H5775><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> by <S%H7651>sevens,<s%> <S%H7651><s%> the <S%H2145>male<s%> and the <S%H5347>female;<s%> to keep <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> living <S%H3351>substance<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6213>made<s%> will I <S%H4229>destroy<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when the <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> went <S%H935>in,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>

Of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5775>fowls,<s%> and of every <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth,<s%>

There went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> the <S%H2145>male<s%> and the <S%H5347>female,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5146>Noah.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> after <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

In the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah's<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H2320>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> were <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4599>fountains<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%> broken <S%H1234>up,<s%> and the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> were <S%H6605>opened.<s%>
And the <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>

In the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark;<s%>

They, <S%H1992><s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>sort.<s%>

And they went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> is the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>

And they that went <S%H935>in,<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shut him <S%H5462>in.<s%> <S%H1157><s%>

And the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7235>increased,<s%> and bore <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> and it was lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed,<s%> and were <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>hills,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> were <S%H3680>covered.<s%>
Fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H4480>upward<s%> <S%H4605><s%> did the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevail;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> that <S%H7430>moved<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> both of <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and of <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and of <S%H2416>beast,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> man: <S%H120><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> in whose <S%H639>nostrils<s%> was the <S%H5397>breath<s%> <S%H7307><s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H2724>dry<s%> land, <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> living <S%H3351>substance<s%> was <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> both <S%H4480>man,<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> the creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and they were <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> alive, and they <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him in the <S%H8392>ark.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
